securityWarning.title: ⚠️ Important: Keep this code private
securityWarning.description: Only scan this QR code on YOUR personal device. Anyone who scans this code will be able to generate access codes for your account. You will receive a confirmation email when 2FA is activated.

step1.title: Step 1: Scan QR Code
step1.description: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
step1.manualEntry: Can't scan? Enter this code manually:
step1.troubleshooting: If you're having trouble, make sure your device's time is synchronized correctly.

warning.title: Important: Save these backup codes
warning.description: Store these codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your authenticator device.

step3.title: Step 3: Verify Setup
step3.description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to complete setup
step3.hint: The code changes every 30 seconds. Make sure to enter the current code.

verify.title: Two-Factor Verification
verify.description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
verify.hint: This verification will be valid for 30 days on this device.

errors.invalidCode: Invalid verification code. Please check your authenticator app and try again.
errors.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please refresh the page and try again.
errors.alreadyConfigured: 2FA is already configured for your account
errors.notConfigured: 2FA is not configured for your account
errors.verificationExpired: Your 2FA verification has expired. Please verify again.
